channel.title: Ask The Expert on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Ask The Expert on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Ask the Expert!
item.description: _UPDATE (October 7, 2009): This post didn’t quite generate the type of questions I was hoping for, and because of that I’m not able to generate a knowledgeable and informed response that would be overtly useful. However, I will leave this topic open for the next little while in the hopes some more questions can be generated. It is entirely possible I haven’t been specific enough in my request for the type of questions I’d like to answer, so here goes.
